of tokens requested for the margin call","_lender":"the address of the _lender who has requested for margin call","_transferFromSavingsAccount":"if true, collateral is transferred from borrower's savings account, if false, it is transferred from borrower's wallet"}},"allowance(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC20-allowance}."},"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-approve}. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"See {IERC20-balanceOf}."},"borrower()":{"returns":{"_0":"address of the borrower"}},"calculateCollateralRatio(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view","params":{"_balance":"the principal amount lent","_liquidityShares":"amount of collateral tokens available"},"returns":{"_0":"_ratio the collateral ratio"}},"calculateCurrentPeriod()":{"returns":{"_0":"current repayment period"}},"calculateRepaymentWithdrawable(address)":{"params":{"_lender":"address of the _lender"},"returns":{"_0":"amount of withdrawable token from the borrow pool"}},"correspondingBorrowTokens(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_fraction":"Incentivizing fraction for the liquidator","_totalCollateralTokens":"amount of collateral tokens"},"returns":{"_0":"corresponding borrow tokens for collateral tokens"}},"decimals()":{"details":"Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless {_setupDecimals} is called. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}."},"decreaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`."},"depositCollateral(uint256,bool)":{"params":{"_amount":"amount of collateral to be deposited denominated in collateral asset","_transferFromSavingsAccount":"if true, collateral is transferred from msg.sender's savings account, if false, it is transferred from their wallet"}},"getBalanceDetails(address)":{"params":{"_lender":"address of the _lender"},"returns":{"_0":"amount of pool tokens available with the _lender","_1":"amount of pool tokens available in the pool"}},"getCurrentCollateralRatio()":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view","returns":{"_0":"_ratio the current collateral ratio of the borrow pool"}},"getCurrentCollateralRatio(address)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view","returns":{"_0":"_ratio the current collateral ratio of the lender"}},"getEquivalentTokens(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"amount of tokens to be converted","_source":"address of the tokens to be converted","_target":"address of target conversion token"},"returns":{"_0":"the equivalent amount of target tokens for given source tokens"}},"getLoanStatus()":{"returns":{"_0":"integer respresenting loan status"}},"getMarginCallEndTime(address)":{"params":{"_lender":"address of the lender who has requested a margin call"},"returns":{"_0":"the time at which the margin call ends"}},"increaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"initialize(uint256,uint256,address,address,address,uint256,uint64,uint64,address,uint256,bool,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_borrowAmountRequested":"the amount of borrow asset requested by the borrower","_borrowAsset":"address of the borrow asset","_borrowRate":"the borrow rate as specified by borrower","_borrower":"address of the borrower","_collateralAmount":"amount of collateral to be deposited by the borrower","_collateralAsset":"address of the collateral asset","_collectionPeriod":"time interval where lender lend into the borrow pool","_idealCollateralRatio":"the ideal collateral ratio of the pool","_loanWithdrawalDuration":"time interval for the borrower to withdraw the lent amount in borrow asset","_noOfRepaymentIntervals":"number of repayments to be done by borrower","_poolSavingsStrategy":"address of the savings strategy preferred","_repaymentInterval":"the interval between to repayments","_transferFromSavingsAccount":"if true, collateral is transferred from msg.sender's savings account, if false, it is transferred from their wallet"}},"interestPerPeriod(uint256)":{"params":{"_balance":"amount of principal lent"},"returns":{"_0":"interest accrued on the principal in a period"}},"interestPerSecond(uint256)":{"params":{"_principal":"amount of principal lent"},"returns":{"_0":"interest accrued on the principal in a second"}},"interestToPay()":{"returns":{"_0":"interest accrued till current time"}},"lend(address,uint256,address,bool)":{"params":{"_amount":"Amount of tokens lent","_fromSavingsAccount":"in case of direct deposits it is false","_lender":"Address of lender on behalf of whom tokens are lent","_strategy":"address of strategy from which tokens are lent if done from savings account,"}},"liquidateCancelPenalty(bool,bool)":{"details":"_receiveLiquidityShares doesn't matter when _toSavingsAccount is true","params":{"_receiveLiquidityShare":"if true, equivalent liquidity tokens are withdrawn. If false, assets are withdrawn","_toSavingsAccount":"if true, liquidity transfered to lender's savings account. If false, liquidity transfered to lender's wallet"}},"liquidateForLender(address,bool,bool,bool)":{"params":{"_fromSavingsAccount":"if true, collateral is transferred from lender's savings account, if false, it is transferred from lender's wallet","_lender":"address of the lender to be liquidated","_recieveLiquidityShare":"if true, equivalent liquidity tokens are withdrawn. If false, assets are withdrawn","_toSavingsAccount":"if true, liquidity transfered to receiver's savings account. If false, liquidity transfered to receiver's wallet"}},"liquidatePool(bool,bool,bool)":{"params":{"_fromSavingsAccount":"if true, collateral is transferred from sender's savings account, if false, it is transferred from sender's wallet","_recieveLiquidityShare":"if true, equivalent liquidity tokens are withdrawn. If false, assets are withdrawn","_toSavingsAccount":"if true, liquidity transfered to sender's savings account. If false, liquidity transfered to sender's wallet"}},"name()":{"details":"Returns the name of the token."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"requestMarginCall()":{"details":"It will revert in case collateral ratio is not below expected value or the lender has already called it."},"symbol()":{"details":"Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name."},"terminatePool()":{"details":"kill switch for owner to terminate the pool"},"totalSupply()":{"returns":{"_0":"total supply of pool tokens"}},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20}. Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``sender``'s tokens of at least `amount`."},"withdrawLiquidity()":{"details":"burns all shares and returns total remaining repayments along with provided liquidity"}},"title":"Pool contract with Methods related to Pool","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"AmountBorrowed(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when borrower withdraws loan"},"CollateralAdded(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when borrower posts collateral"},"CollateralWithdrawn(address,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when borrower withdraws excess collateral"},"LenderLiquidated(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when collateral backing lender is liquidated because of a margin call"},"LiquiditySupplied(uint256,address)":{"notice":"emitted when lender supplies liquidity to a pool"},"LiquidityWithdrawn(uint256,address)":{"notice":"emitted when lender withdraws from borrow pool"},"MarginCallCollateralAdded(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when borrower tokens"},"depositCollateral(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"add collateral to a pool"},"getBalanceDetails(address)":{"notice":"used to get the balance details of a principal amount"},"interestToPay()":{"notice":"used to get the interest accrued till current time in the current loan duration"},"lend(address,uint256,address,bool)":{"notice":"used by lender to params._amount: amount of tokens requested for the margin call
params._lender: the address of the _lender who has requested for margin call
params._transferFromSavingsAccount: if true, collateral is transferred from borrower's savings account, if false, it is transferred from borrower's wallet

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

calculateCollateralRatio(uint256,uint256.details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view

returns._0: amount of withdrawable token from the borrow pool
corresponding borrow tokens for collateral tokens

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless {_setupDecimals} is called. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

params._amount: amount of collateral to be deposited denominated in collateral asset
params._transferFromSavingsAccount: if true, collateral is transferred from msg.sender's savings account, if false, it is transferred from their wallet

returns._0: amount of pool tokens available with the _lender
returns._1: amount of pool tokens available in the pool

getCurrentCollateralRatio().details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view

returns._0: _ratio the current collateral ratio of the borrow pool

getCurrentCollateralRatio(address).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view

returns._0: _ratio the current collateral ratio of the lender

params._amount: amount of tokens to be converted
params._source: address of the tokens to be converted

returns._0: the equivalent amount of target tokens for given source tokens

params._lender: address of the lender who has requested a margin call

returns._0: the time at which the margin call ends

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

params._borrowAmountRequested: the amount of borrow asset requested by the borrower
params._borrowRate: the borrow rate as specified by borrower
params._collateralAmount: amount of collateral to be deposited by the borrower
params._collectionPeriod: time interval where lender lend into the borrow pool
params._idealCollateralRatio: the ideal collateral ratio of the pool
params._loanWithdrawalDuration: time interval for the borrower to withdraw the lent amount in borrow asset
params._noOfRepaymentIntervals: number of repayments to be done by borrower
params._poolSavingsStrategy: address of the savings strategy preferred
params._transferFromSavingsAccount: if true, collateral is transferred from msg.sender's savings account, if false, it is transferred from their wallet

returns._0: interest accrued on the principal in a period
interest accrued on the principal in a second

params._fromSavingsAccount: in case of direct deposits it is false
params._lender: Address of lender on behalf of whom tokens are lent
params._strategy: address of strategy from which tokens are lent if done from savings account,

params._receiveLiquidityShare: if true, equivalent liquidity tokens are withdrawn. If false, assets are withdrawn
params._toSavingsAccount: if true, liquidity transfered to lender's savings account. If false, liquidity transfered to lender's wallet

params._fromSavingsAccount: if true, collateral is transferred from lender's savings account, if false, it is transferred from lender's wallet
params._lender: address of the lender to be liquidated
params._recieveLiquidityShare: if true, equivalent liquidity tokens are withdrawn. If false, assets are withdrawn
params._toSavingsAccount: if true, liquidity transfered to receiver's savings account. If false, liquidity transfered to receiver's wallet

params._fromSavingsAccount: if true, collateral is transferred from sender's savings account, if false, it is transferred from sender's wallet
params._recieveLiquidityShare: if true, equivalent liquidity tokens are withdrawn. If false, assets are withdrawn
params._toSavingsAccount: if true, liquidity transfered to sender's savings account. If false, liquidity transfered to sender's wallet

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

requestMarginCall().details: It will revert in case collateral ratio is not below expected value or the lender has already called it.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

terminatePool().details: kill switch for owner to terminate the pool

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20}. Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``sender``'s tokens of at least `amount`.

withdrawLiquidity().details: burns all shares and returns total remaining repayments along with provided liquidity

addCollateralInMarginCall(address,uint25.notice: used to add extra collateral deposit during margin calls

borrower().notice: used to get the address of the borrower of the pool

calculateCollateralRatio(uint256,uint256.notice: used to calculate the collateral ratio

calculateCurrentPeriod().notice: used to get the current repayment period for the borrow pool

calculateRepaymentWithdrawable(address).notice: public function used to get the withdrawable amount for a _lender

cancelPool().notice: used to cancel pool when the minimum borrow amount is not met

closeLoan().notice: called to close the loan after repayment of principal

correspondingBorrowTokens(uint256,uint25.notice: used to get corresponding borrow tokens for given collateral tokens

getBalanceDetails(address).notice: used to get the balance details of a _lender

getCurrentCollateralRatio().notice: used to get the current collateral ratio of the borrow pool

getCurrentCollateralRatio(address).notice: used to get the current collateral ratio of a lender

getEquivalentTokens(address,address,uint.notice: used to get the equivalent amount of tokens from source to target tokens

getLoanStatus().notice: used to get the loan status of the borrow pool

getMarginCallEndTime(address).notice: used to get the end time for a margin call

initialize(uint256,uint256,address,addre.notice: initializing the pool and adding initial collateral

interestPerPeriod(uint256).notice: used to get the interest per period on the principal amount

interestPerSecond(uint256).notice: used to get the interest per second on the principal amount

interestToPay().notice: used to get the interest accrued till current time in the current loan duration

lend(address,uint256,address,bool).notice: used by lender to supply liquidity to a borrow pool

lenders(address).notice: used to keep track of lenders' details

liquidateCancelPenalty(bool,bool).notice: used to liquidate the penalty amount when pool is cancelled

liquidateForLender(address,bool,bool,boo.notice: used to liquidate lender and burn lender's shares

liquidatePool(bool,bool,bool).notice: used to liquidate the pool if the borrower has defaulted

requestMarginCall().notice: function is executed by lender to exercise margin call

totalSupply().notice: used to total supply of pool tokens for the pool

withdrawBorrowedAmount().notice: used by the borrower to withdraw tokens from the pool when loan is active

withdrawLiquidity().notice: used to return total remaining repayments along with provided liquidity to the lender

withdrawRepayment().notice: used to get the withdrawable amount of borrow token for a lender
